item.title: Insurance fraud analytics
item.description: An overview of published and ongoing research papers within the insurance fraud research line developed in my lab. Social network analytics for supervised fraud detection in insurance Collaborators: María Óskarsdóttir, Waqas Ahmed, Katrien Antonio, Bart Baesens, Rémi Dendievel, Tom Donas and Tom Reynkens, research in the framework of the Ageas CE Research Chair. Journal paper: submitted Working paper: available here Presentations: EAJ Leuven 2018, Cass & KU Leuven symposium 2019, Insurance Data Science 2019 (ETH), IME Munchen 2019.
